document.full_text: a u.s. appeals court granted the nfl's request to put the lockout back into effect friday in a decision that came only hours after players across the league had returned to work.
document.title: court restores lockout hours after players return
lines_and_colors: a u.s. appeals court granted the nfl's request to put the lockout back into effect friday in a decision that came only hours after players across the league had returned to work.
